column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of Re6Zr were made by arc melting stoichiometric amounts of pure Zr slug (99.99% Alfa Aesar) and Re slug (99.99% Alfa Aesar) under a partial pressure of ultra high purity argon gas on a watercooled copper hearth with a tungsten electrode.
#Text=The button of Re6Zr was flipped several times and remelted to ensure a homogeneous sample.
#Text=Mass loss during the synthesis was negligible, and the sample formed a uniform and hard button.
#Text=Several off-stoichiometric samples were made to check the effect of stoichiometry on Tc.
#Text=We also synthesized and studied samples doped with Hf, Ti, W, and Os to check the effect of doping on Tc.
